content: This is an invitation for bids for the Gettysburg/Norwich Alley Reconstruction project (CIP 19-15) in Fresno County, California. The project involves reconstructing the alley from Villa Avenue to Gettysburg Avenue, including constructing a valley gutter, drive approaches, and adjusting utilities to grade. The bid due date is November 1, 2022, and the project is a lump-sum award for categories including road and highway building materials, paving/resurfacing alley and parking lot, construction parking lot and alley, and paving/resurfacing alley and parking lot. There is no estimated bid value, and there is no pre-bid meeting or online Q&A.
